entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023
